function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of individual room control for cooling may lead to uneven temperature distribution and poor ventilation in certain areas, increasing the risk of airborne disease transmission.","Impact":"Increased likelihood of airborne disease transmission in areas with poor ventilation and temperature control.","Mitigation":"Implement zoning and smart ventilation control systems to ensure uniform temperature distribution and adequate ventilation in all areas.","Technologies":"Zoned HVAC systems, smart ventilation controls.","People":"Building occupants, particularly those in poorly ventilated areas.","Owner":"Building management, HVAC system designer."},{"Description":"Dependence on manual control for lighting and dynamic envelope elements may result in suboptimal use of natural light and ventilation, leading to indoor air quality issues and increased risk of airborne disease transmission.","Impact":"Potential for poor indoor air quality, uneven temperature distribution, and insufficient natural light, increasing the risk of airborne disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Implement automated lighting and dynamic envelope control systems to optimize natural light usage and ventilation, improving indoor air quality and reducing the risk of airborne disease transmission.","Technologies":"Automated lighting systems, smart blinds, dynamic window controls.","People":"Building occupants, especially those affected by poor indoor air quality and inadequate natural light.","Owner":"Building management, facility maintenance team."}]}
